about_the_game:
The cat gets into the tower, where he will have to go through an obstacle course and survive. For one level of passage, he has only 3 lives to collect all the gold and open the portal to the next level. With each level, the coins will be more difficult to get, because some will be hidden from the player's keen eye. The peculiarity of the game is that you will need to test your reaction and speed of action, because one wrong step and the plates under the player will disappear, and some will rise to the skies.

A fun and addictive game that will take you through more than one level.


- Nice graphics

- Funny music

- Responsive controls

- Remarkable visual effects

- Many interesting levels

The peculiarity of the game is that you will need to test your reaction and speed of action, because one wrong step and the plates under the player will disappear, and some will rise to the skies.

A fun and addictive game that will take you through more than one level.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11 (“El Capitan”)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500, 3.2 GH
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: Cat Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
